mean_cn: n.适应，适应性的变化；改编，改写本
mean_en: a change in a plant or animal that makes it better able to live in a particular place or situation
sentence: Arctic foxes changing color seasonally is an example of adaptation to the environment.
sentence_trans: 北极狐季节性的变色是适应环境的一个例子。
word_etyma: ad加强 + apt适应，能力 + ation名词后缀 → 适应 → 适应【各种人】的书 → adaptation（书）改写本
